title: o1 mini emission per output token (EcoLogits v2)
description:
There is little official information available about the model o1 mini. To estimate emissions, we apply the methodology proposed by the nonprofit organization GenAI Impact, which separately considers GPU and server power consumption when modeling AI inference emissions. For GPU energy consumption, they use an exponential regression model that estimates energy per output token as a function of active parameters and batch size. For server energy consumption, they model the token generation latency based on the token throughput. See the full documentation for a comprehensive overview.

To account for data center infrastructure such as cooling equipment, a Power Usage Effectiveness (PUE) factor of 1.2x is applied.
